overview: This is a human 3 weeks after kissing that baby we call gamma radiation. This is that flesh drooping off your bones. In fact, this is your bones made out of oily liquid. And this. This is robot. This is robot day after day, hour after hour, nigh infinity.
tagline: "There's 500 fucking things wrong with this world, and that's not even me trying..."
title: Top 10 Reasons for Robot Leadership
